title: "my" shop MISSING?
body: I opened up my shop today and played a few games and logged off. Now after I logged back on my "your shop" button is missing from the client. Is anyone else having this problem? Re-logging doesn't seem to help.

replies.body: I had the same problem as well. And I had Project Zed 60% off too! Aaaugh!!! What's going on?!?!
SAME but i had Project yasuo also at 70% off, im so sad :( i wish i bought them earlier :/
It's back up! (For me anyways. Hopefully it's the same for you all.) Project Zed is still 60% off, and (obviously) I got it right away. I hope you got your Project Yasuo 60% off, NATDABEST!
Same here, but mine never showed up!

The [**status page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) shows that it's still currently disabled due to some weird bugs. [**This post**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/riot-official/REhwqdew-your-shop-is-open?comment=005a) also explains a little more as to what's going on.
I just read the notification. They disabled My shop due to bug fixes.
